A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was awful. Made a rotten tomatoes account just to say it. Too many subplots\, too many characters. All the time is spent on attempted character development for random\, new and unimportant characters\, most of whom have no real connection to the overall story arch for both this trilogy as well as star wars as a whole. This occurs whilst other hugely important characters are given very little screen time and then killed off unceremoniously. The continued attempts at childish humour were grossly unnecessary\, misguided and misplaced. I was extremely disappointed and for the life of me cannot see how critics enjoyed this piece of trash\, which went out of its way to cater to the lowest common denominator.
